org.treetank.api

Interface IPageWriteTrx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPageReadTrx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PageWriteTrx

    public interface IPageWriteTrx
extends IPageReadTrx
    Write-Transaction of a page ensuring read- and write access to any pages. The transaction is bound on the very last revision and bases on a session. Each IPageWriteTrx can afterwards get nodes from the page-layer and the underlaying backend as well as store new INodes in the backend.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commit()
      Simple commit of this page transaction to store the newest version.

      Removing the node from the storage.
